title: [BUG] MLflow lack of support for mlflow.tensorflow.log_model with gs:// path
body:
Thank you for submitting an issue. Please refer to our [issue policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)
for information on what types of issues we address.

For help with debugging your code, please refer to [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/mlflow).

  
Please do not delete this template unless you are sure your issue is outside its scope.

### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**:
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: Debian
- **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: pip installer
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**: 1.2.0
- **Python version**:  3.5
- **npm version, if running the dev UI**:
- **Exact command to reproduce**:

```
        mlflow.tensorflow.log_model(tf_saved_model_dir=model_local_path,
                                    tf_meta_graph_tags=[tag_constants.SERVING],
                                    tf_signature_def_key='serving_default',
                                    artifact_path='model')
```

When model_local_path is `gs://` this generates an error, and need to be local file.

tf_saved_model_dir â€“ Path to the directory containing serialized TensorFlow variables and graphs in SavedModel format. In this case I'm saving in a GCS location and need to log the artifacts.

Workaround:

```
        if model_local_path.startswith('gs://'):
            logging.info('Creating temp folder')
            temp = tempfile.mkdtemp()
            model_deployment.copy_artifacts(model_local_path, temp)
            model_local_path = os.path.join(temp, 'model')
```

### Describe the problem

mlflow.tensorflow.log_model do not save artifacts when using gs://

### Code to reproduce issue

```
        mlflow.tensorflow.log_model(tf_saved_model_dir=model_local_path,
                                    tf_meta_graph_tags=[tag_constants.SERVING],
                                    tf_signature_def_key='serving_default',
                                    artifact_path='model')
```


### Other info / logs

```
I0820 15:57:29.521131 4354602432 saver.py:1280] Restoring parameters from gs://mlflow_gcp/jobs/bdbda11f04b54981b4fee4b620ae13da/model/variables/variables
2019/08/20 15:57:29 INFO mlflow.tensorflow: Validation succeeded!
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/gogasca/homebrew/Cellar/python/3.7.2_2/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.7/lib/python3.7/runpy.py", line 193, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", mod_spec)
  File "/Users/gogasca/homebrew/Cellar/python/3.7.2_2/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.7/lib/python3.7/runpy.py", line 85, in _run_code
    exec(code, run_globals)
  File "/Users/gogasca/Documents/Development/dpe/ml-on-gcp/tutorials/tensorflow/mlflow_gcp/trainer/task.py", line 312, in <module>
    train_and_evaluate(args)
  File "/Users/gogasca/Documents/Development/dpe/ml-on-gcp/tutorials/tensorflow/mlflow_gcp/trainer/task.py", line 272, in train_and_evaluate
    artifact_path='model')
  File "/Users/gogasca/Documents/Development/dpe/venv/mlflownev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/utils/annotations.py", line 58, in wrapper
    return func(**kwargs)
  File "/Users/gogasca/Documents/Development/dpe/venv/mlflownev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/tensorflow.py", line 110, in log_model
    tf_signature_def_key=tf_signature_def_key, conda_env=conda_env)
  File "/Users/gogasca/Documents/Development/dpe/venv/mlflownev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/models/__init__.py", line 77, in log
    flavor.save_model(path=local_path, mlflow_model=mlflow_model, **kwargs)
  File "/Users/gogasca/Documents/Development/dpe/venv/mlflownev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/utils/annotations.py", line 58, in wrapper
    return func(**kwargs)
  File "/Users/gogasca/Documents/Development/dpe/venv/mlflownev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/tensorflow.py", line 164, in save_model
    root_relative_path = _copy_file_or_tree(src=tf_saved_model_dir, dst=path, dst_dir=None)
  File "/Users/gogasca/Documents/Development/dpe/venv/mlflownev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/utils/file_utils.py", line 337, in _copy_file_or_tree
    shutil.copytree(src=src, dst=dst_path)
  File "/Users/gogasca/Documents/Development/dpe/venv/mlflownev/lib/python3.7/shutil.py", line 315, in copytree
    names = os.listdir(src)
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'gs://mlflow_gcp/jobs/bdbda11f04b54981b4fee4b620ae13da/model'
```
